function.description: Add the provided XML string as a child to node, optionally at a provided position. Returns the newly created node.

example.title: Usage
example.header: Assuming we have an XML file note.xml which contains the following:
example.code: < note id="1"> < to>Tove< /to> < from>Jani< /from> < heading>Reminder< /heading> < body>Don't forget me this weekend!< /body> < /note>
< note id="1"> < to>Tove< /to> < from>Jani< /from> < heading>Reminder< /heading> < body>Don't forget me this weekend!< /body> < comment>Comments are welcome.< /comment> < /note>
